programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox, S04E05, The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang, S04E02, Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Landsat
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat, S04E06, Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Stargazer's Paradise
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Stargazer's Paradise, S02E04, The Atacama desert is a perfect place for watching the night sky. With still winds and only a handful of cloudy nights each year, it allows scientists to get the absolute most out of their tools.

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays, S04E04, Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

How to Colonize the Stars, 20090101080000 +0000, Leading physicists and engineers in the field of interstellar travel discuss some of the deep issues we face when considering the problem of sending spacecraft to other stars. Will mankind ever truly become a space fairing civilization?

programme.title: The Mystery of the Milky Way

In the Shadow of the Moon, 20070101080000 +0000, Between 1968 and 1972, the world watched in awe each time an American spacecraft voyaged to the Moon. Only 12 men walked upon its surface and they remain the only human beings to have stood on another world.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E06, The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E18, A forensic scientist's painstaking examination of a rape kit helps solve the 15-year-old murder of a teenage girl. And when California investigators probe the murder of a 71-year-old man, they get help from the top suspect's former therapist.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E07, A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E05, College student Brad Perry shows up to work his graveyard shift at the gas station and is never seen alive again.

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.

programme.title: The Flaming Gorge Falls/Caught In The Mail
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E16, A man suspected of the cold case murder of his wife and son hatches a new plot to kill his mother and father; and detectives solve the 20-year-old murder of a teenager by tricking her killer into licking an envelope.

programme.title: Written In Blood
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E19, In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi motherless. Nearly 40 years later, she vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: Love and Hate
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E07, Near what's known as the hanging tree, the mutilated body of Timothy Coggins is found in late 1983. The investigation is thwarted and the case freezes for over 30 years, until a newly elected sheriff vows to bring the killers to justice.

programme.title: The Sunday Morning Slasher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E11, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Sisters In Death
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E17, March 1984. Jack Kennedy discovers his daughters brutally murdered. Their mother and niece spend their lives keeping the case alive. DNA leads nowhere. 30 years later, an informant gives up a name.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E21, A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Bump In The Night/Hitchhike To Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E24, A woman who takes down the license plate number of a car that had been following her helps police solve the murder of another young woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E20, Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Mistaken for a Killer/The Boy and the Monster
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E27, Advances in DNA technology that take place over 20 years help police to finally identify the man who brutally stabbed two women to death.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E09, When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E3005, A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E15, A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Rocket Attack U.S.A.
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Rocket Attack U.S.A., S02E05, The crew watches the second chapter of The Phantom Creeps and a film about an American spy sent to the Soviet Union to investigate a missile attack. Joel hosts a quiz show with the Bots.

programme.title: The Black Scorpion
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Black Scorpion, S02E13, Giant scorpions rise out of a volcano and attack Mexico in The Black Scorpion (1957) while the Bots throw a party for Joel.

programme.title: Untamed Youth
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Untamed Youth, S01E12, Joel invents a pipe with a smoke detector and a sprinkler system built in for the invention exchange. The guys watch a 1950s teen flick about youths sentenced to manual labor at a cotton farm.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: Big Changes
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E15, Part three of the complete history of MST3K takes a look at the changes the series underwent throughout the course of its run, including the host and network shifts.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Sport Parade: Snow Thrills
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E13, A classic newsreel that highlights various winter sports.
MST3K: The Painted Hills, 20170901070000 +0000, A Lassie movie, set in 1870s California amongst rival gold miners. The 1950s-era short teaches college students how to improve their hygiene.

MST3K: Robot Holocaust, 19900113000000 +0000, After the ninth chapter of Radar Men From The Moon (1952) ends in technical difficulties, Joel and the bots must endure Robot Holocaust (1986). They pretend to be characters from the movie, but Tom Servo is the only one who is into it.
MST3K: First Spaceship On Venus, 19901229000000 +0000, A multinational team of astronauts heads to Venus, but finds a world destroyed by nuclear war.
MST3K: Parts: The Clonus Horror, 19970607000000 +0000, Scientists run a clone farm for VIPs while Pearl and her goons are forced into babysitting omnipotent Space Children.

MST3K: Star Force: Fugitive Alien II, 19911116000000 +0000, Ken and the crew of the Bacchus 3 return in Star Force: Fugitive Alien II (1987) while Joel and the Bots make a Captain Joe action figure and stage a "name that puppet" quiz show.

A Dog Named Christmas, 20091129000000 +0000, A developmentally-challenged young man is determined to prove to his family that he can care for a dog on his own. In his triumph, he inspires his father to love the new member of the family. Stars Bruce Greenwood, Linda Emond.
Welcome to Christmas, 20181209000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. The town of Christmas tries to convince a developer to build a ski resort.

Fallen Angel, 19981231000000 +0000, A high-powered Los Angeles lawyer returns to his deceased father's home in Maine where he is reunited with his past. Stars Gary Sinise, and Joely Richardson. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.
Christmas Homecoming, 20171118000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A military widow and an Army Captain team up to save the town's military museum.

A Majestic Christmas, 20181202000000 +0000, Nell must take her hometown playhouse to a multiplex, against her own wishes. She hopes a crash course in Christmas will give the new owner, Connor, a change of heart. Stars Jerrika Hinton and Christian Vincent.
A Gingerbread Romance, 20181216000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. An architect teams up with local baker to build a life-size gingerbread house.
A Family Christmas Gift, 20191222000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Amber spends the holidays with her Aunt Dora and helps plan a Christmas Concert.

A Dog Named Christmas, 20091129000000 +0000, A developmentally-challenged young man is determined to prove to his family that he can care for a dog on his own. In his triumph, he inspires his father to love the new member of the family. Stars Bruce Greenwood, Linda Emond.
Love on the Air, 20150926000000 +0000, Competing radio personalities in Chicago find common ground when they have to work together. Stars Alison Sweeney and Jonathan Scarfe.

Mom's Day Away, 20140510000000 +0000, Laura Miller is a happily married mother of two, but as Mother's Day draws near, Laura begins to feel unappreciated in her household. She escapes with her friend for a Mother's Day break in Napa.

Stargate: The Ark of Truth, 20080101000000 +0000, When the SG-1 crew discovers that a final assault on Earth is in the works and a double-agent is scheming among them, their mission takes on a new meaning as they travel to the Ori's home galaxy to overtake their arch enemy before it's too late.

Stargate SG-1, S05E10, SG-1 discover an opportunity to form an alliance with an advanced race who are willing to share their technology. They are the Aschen, the danger of whom the future SG-1 team warned about. Will the truth be revealed before it is too late?

programme.title: Desperate Measures
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E11, When Major Carter is abducted by a reclusive billionaire with nefarious plans that threaten her life, O'Neill and the rest of the SG-1 team must work with an old adversary to solve the mystery of her disappearance and bring her back alive!

programme.title: Wormhole X-Treme!
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E12, A ship headed for Earth is linked to the pod found through the alien Martin. Investigating what he knows, SG-1 finds Martin has become a consultant on a sci-fi series called Wormhole X-treme!, with a plot uncannily like the Stargate program!

programme.title: Proving Ground
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E13, Col. Jack O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and his new SG recruits have become the targets of a secret hostile takeover. Now it's up to a wounded O'Neill and his neophyte troop to save the command center from a possible alien invasion!

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E14, During a pursuit by the Goa'uld gliders, Teal'c fails to make it through the Stargate before it is destroyed. Now SG-1 has only 48 hours to reestablish Teal'c's energy signature from the temporary memory of the Stargate before it's erased…for good!

programme.title: Summit
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E15, A truce is declared among the Goa'uld, so that the warlords can attend a summit on the future of universe domination. As Jackson speaks fluent Goa'uld, he is sent to the summit disguised as an aide. But his real mission is to poison the delegates!

programme.title: Last Stand
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E16, Embattled and under siege, SG-1 attempts to escape a Goa'uld search and destroy mission bent on finding them and the secret crystal they carry. Meanwhile, the balance of life is threatened by the reappearance of the evil System Lord Anubis.

programme.title: Fail Safe
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E17, As an asteroid hurtles toward Earth, SG-1 uses an abandoned Goa'uld ship as a launch pad for a mega-bomb designed to destroy the rock before impact. But when SGC loses the ship's signal, it's feared that the team is dead and that Earth is in peril.

programme.title: The Warrior
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E18, K'tano, former First Prime of the late Imhotep, is now the leader of a powerful Jaffa rebellion. SG-1 visits his stronghold in hopes of securing an alliance. But O'Neill soon learns that this strategic partnership may well come at a heavy price.

programme.title: Menace
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E19, A dormant female android discovered on a barren planet is transported back to Earth for study. On reactivation, she exhibits a childlike innocence. But soon, SG-1 discovers that this seemingly innocent being may hold a dangerous secret.

programme.title: The Sentinel
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E20, Col. O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) must enlist the aid of a couple of convicted felons in a bid to save a planet from the Goa'uld. With an attack looming, an entire world's salvation rests in the hands of SG-1 and two former NID operatives.

programme.title: Meridian
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E21, Exposed to a lethal dose of radiation, Jackson has just hours to live. SG-1 tries everything in its power to save him, but as the hours tick away, Jackson's spirit meets with each member individually to discuss his next mission: life after death.

programme.title: Revelations
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E22, Still dealing with the death of one of their own, SG-1 must put its mourning aside in order to confront the warlord Anubis—who has captured the Asgard leader Thor so he can extract the secrets of their ancient technology for universal domination.

programme.title: Missing
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E07, Arriving on New Athos for an overnight visit, Teyla and Dr. Keller discover the entire settlement abandoned and their own lives in jeopardy from the Bola Kai, a fierce warrior tribe. The pair must avoid capture until Atlantis sends a search party.

programme.title: The Seer
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E08, With still no trace of the Athosians, Teyla requests an off-world visit to meet with a seer, Davos, who may be able to help her find her people. Meanwhile on Atlantis, Agent Woolsey arrives to observe and review Col. Carter.

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E09, After working for countless hours on the Replicator coding, Dr. McKay reluctantly admits that he needs help from his sister, Jeanie. But she goes missing, McKay travels to Earth determined to find her and uncover who is behind the kidnapping.

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E22, Kelly and Dylan subdue a man who tries to attack a pregnant woman and her child. Gina receives an offer to become a skating commentator. Noah reveals that he has a half-sister, who is working at a nearby diner.

programme.title: End of the World As We Know It
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E23, Noah's father's company is sued by Matt; Katie moves forward with David; a nannycam catches Matt and Kelly making love; Steve goes Y2Krazy, ignoring - or avoiding - a trip with Janet; a model makes a play for Donna.

programme.title: Agony
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E25, Kelly receives medical treatment and files a police report. Matt helps a thief gain his release through a technicality. Although Dylan warns that she is still fragile, David asks Gina on a date.

programme.title: The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E01, Kelly is arrested and held overnight until the shooting is ruled a justifiable homicide. David asks Dylan to move out. Wayne annoys Donna with his cavalier attitude, particularly when he fails to show sensitivity toward Kelly.

programme.title: A Fine Mess
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E04, Steve buys an engagement ring and practices proposals, often with Noah assuming the role of Janet. Dylan grows tired of living with Gina and suggests that she find her own place. David's radio show becomes popular due to his abrasive tactics.

programme.title: The Loo-Ouch
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E05, Steve and Janet announce the pregnancy and engagement to her parents, who respond by calling Janet a disgrace. Matt and Noah each offer to move out so that Steve can move Janet and the baby into the house.

programme.title: 80's Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E06, David's radio persona gets flack-and ratings; Matt tries to overturn a death sentence for a rapist-murderer; the after-hours club attracts the wrong attention; Steve haunts the house.

programme.title: Baby, You Can Drive My Car
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E08, Janet begins to panic about wedding preparations. Steve suggests that they organize a scavenger hunt for their friends, with clues providing the location of a party. Gina freaks out when Dylan refuses to pull over and help a stray dog.

programme.title: Family Tree
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E09, Steve and Janet endure various calamaties on their honeymoon. Just as they are beginning to have a good time, Janet goes into labor. Jackie seeks full custody of Erin, and David and Kelly try to keep their sister's spirits up.

programme.title: Nine Yolks Whipped Lightly
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E12, Gina's meeting with her father is unsatisfying, similar to Janet and her parents; Donna can't let go of Noah's accident; Dylan loses control in front of kids, and has second thoughts about Kelly, but is too late.

programme.title: I'm Using You 'Cause I Like You
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E14, Donna and David meet promising new mates; Kelly decides to quit the store; Matt violates his suspension; Dylan suffers from fast-lane acquaintances; the Sanders' hire a nanny.

programme.title: The Final Proof
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E16, Dylan accedes to Shane's demands for Noah; Kelly and Matt prepare to go on a couples game show; Dr. Martin tries to bond with Gina.

programme.title: Eddie Waitkus
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E18, A news report shows a live dead-ringer for Dylan's late father; Noah intrudes on Donna's meeting someone new; Kelly compromises her personal feelings for her profession; David gets the wrong idea when he overhears Camille talking with friends.

programme.title: Ever Heard the One About the Exploding Father?
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E20, Dylan's father makes him an offer; Steve lobbies for Ryan's return to college; David interviews for a job in New York; Matt represents a stand-up comic fired for not being funny.

programme.title: The Easter Bunny
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E22, Kelly grows suspicious of Matt's distant behavior. Camille tries to convince Donna to sell her clothing online. Steve and Janet fear that her parents' dog is to blame for the death of their snooty neighbors' pet rabbit.

programme.title: And Don't Forget to Give Me Back My Black T-Shirt
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E23, Mitch annoys Donna by trying to plan their entire relationship via an electronic organizer. Janet nixes Steve's plans to invest in Donna's site because of their limited finances.

programme.title: Love Is Blind
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E24, Dylan's generous wedding gift vexes Kelly and Matt, who consider moving to Seattle; an offer for their tabloid separates the Sanders' professionally; Noah meets Ellen's family; Donna's mother sells her house.

Sleeping With Danger, 20250801012600 +0000, Flight attendant Kate Jewell must go into hiding when the man of her dreams becomes increasingly jealous and violent.

programme.desc: My Life Is a Lifetime Movie, 20250801031100 +0000, A woman begs for the return of her husband after he vanishes.

Searching for a Serial Killer: The Regina Smith Story, 20250801040000 +0000, Determined to provide a safer world for her daughter, single mother Regina Smith joins the Dallas Police Department. As a rookie, she soon discovers crucial evidence that lands her on the doorstep of a serial killer known as the Eyeball Killer.

A Rose for Her Grave: The Randy Roth Story, 20250801055600 +0000, Lori becomes distraught when her best friend, Cindy Roth, drowns under mysterious circumstances while on a trip with her husband, Randy. Determined to honor Cindy and learn the truth, she starts to uncover disturbing evidence from Randy's past.

Bad Romance: The Vicky White Story, 20250801075200 +0000, Corrections officer Vicky White develops a secret infatuation with new prisoner Casey White. With his inevitable transfer looming, Vicky risks everything to break Casey out of jail, leading authorities on a nationwide manhunt.
Christmas Belle, 20131208000000 +0000, It's "Beauty & the Beast" at Christmas when Belle meets cantankerous Hunter, but soon he begins to warm…putting their work and Belle's heart at risk.

A New Husband for Christmas, 20201101000000 +0000, Stan and Kelly Stevenson seem to be more committed to growing apart rather than growing together. Their friends are caught in the middle of divorce conversations during one of the most joyous seasons of the year.
